Question
========
  
Which regression equation reflects an ANCOVA model without interaction, containing 1 factor (*g*=2) and 1 covariate?

  
Answerlist
----------
* $\hat{y}=a +b_{1}z_{1}+b_{2}z_{2}$
* $\hat{y}=a +bx+b_{1}z_{1}$
* $\hat{y}=a +bx+b_{1}z_{1}+b_{2}z_{2}$
* $\hat{y}=a +b_{1}x_{1}+b_{2}x_{2}+b_{3}x_{3}$

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
